original_text: And he ruled over all the kings from the Euphrates to the land of the Philistines and to the border of Egypt.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 유브라데 강에서부터 블레셋 땅과 애굽 지경까지의 모든 왕을 다스렸으며

sentences.original_text: And he ruled over all the kings
from the Euphrates to the land of the Philistines
and to the border of Egypt.
